summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021 between an FBI forensic accountant and a prosecutor, discussing the provision of financial account documents related to Jeffrey Epstein. The accountant sends documents for accounts where Ghislaine Maxwell was a signer, and the prosecutor requests follow-up account statements to see balances.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as a signer on Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts, which are the subject of the document request from the FBI forensic accountant.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The financial accounts under discussion are identified as belonging to him.

connections.description: Maxwell was a signer on Epstein's financial accounts, indicating a formal financial association and likely control over assets.

events.title: FBI Accountant Sends Epstein Documents
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant compiles and sends documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts where Ghislaine Maxwell was a signer.

events.title: Prosecutor Requests Additional Account Statements
events.description: A prosecutor requests follow-up account statements to see balances after the initial documents were provided, indicating an ongoing financial investigation.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was a signer on Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts.
The FBI's New York Field Office was actively investigating Epstein's financial records as of October 2021.
Prosecutors were seeking account balances to understand the financial activity in accounts associated with Epstein and Maxwell.
